trans-unit.source:
\n

When overridden in a derived class, binds the event to the component.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxx xxxxx$ xxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A component that provides events to the delegate.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

A delegate that represents the method that handles the event.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

When overridden in a derived class, gets the type of component this event is bound to.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxx xxxxx$ xxxx xxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xx xxxxx xx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

When overridden in a derived class, gets the type of delegate for the event.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxx xxxxx$ xxxx xxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the event delegate is a multicast delegate.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxx xxxxx$ xxxx x xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if the event delegate is multicast; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

When overridden in a derived class, unbinds the delegate from the component so that the delegate will no longer receive events from the component.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxx xxxxx$ xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The component that the delegate is bound to.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The delegate to unbind from the component.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx.
